bibl.title: Divine Names in the Derveni Papyrus and Mesopotamian Hermeneutics.
bibl.note: The Derveni papyrus and the Akkadian commentary tradition. - The Orphic Theogony. - The Philosophical Cosmogony. - Enūma eliš. - Cosmogony as a Semantic Container. - The Cosmic God as Semantic Container. - The Role of Divine Names in the Interpretation of the Cosmogony. - Explanation of Names. - Where Divine Names Come From? - The Semantic Model behind the Etymologies. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Jacobo Myerston, Divine Names in the Derveni Papyrus and Mesopotamian Hermeneutics.

The Derveni papyrus and the Akkadian commentary tradition. - The Orphic Theogony. - The Philosophical Cosmogony. - Enūma eliš. - Cosmogony as a Semantic Container. - The Cosmic God as Semantic Container. - The Role of Divine Names in the Interpretation of the Cosmogony. - Explanation of Names. - Where Divine Names Come From? - The Semantic Model behind the Etymologies. - Avec résumé en anglais.
